Night Shade looked at him. "Well, you could tell me where they were, 
but you would still be a tratior. I could change my icon, but then i 
would see your base. You could blind fold me, but that would look 
strange." She looks at the caveman. "Any ideas from you?"


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Windlord:
> 
> "You're right, my pal... She's in bad shape"said Windlord and 
> looking to NightShade he said"and it's amazing that a predacon say 
> the true... But question is that We're in a unusuall situation: I 
> can't destroy you, 'cause that would be dishonorable; I can't take 
> you prisioner, isn't will be fair 'cause we hadn't fought and you 
> aren't guilty of your mates' crimes, by now;I can't leave you to 
> die, 'cause that would be cruel; and I can't lead you to your 
> mates 'cause that would be taken as treason by my fellows and yours 
> will kill me... What acomplicated situation"
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Gimliyotoden@a... wrote:
> > The Caveman approached. "Is...sh...lik...yo.." He looked her up 
> and down, 
> > "Sh..bad...damag..."
